additional_info: Keywords: 0D biomaterials, inductive properties, nanomaterials, tissue engineering, biomimetic scaffolds. Info: Investigate how zero‐dimensional materials (quantum dots, nanoparticles) can induce cell differentiation and regenerative responses. Focus on synthesis methods, surface modifications, and in vitro/in vivo bioactivity assays.

Keywords: 1000 Genomes, rare variants, penetrance, genetic mapping, population genomics. Info: Explore dataset analysis of rare versus common variants, their phenotypic impact, bioinformatics pipelines, and genotype–phenotype correlations in large cohorts.
